mapper.select: SELECT b.booking_id, b.course_id, b.user_id, b.booking_date, p.payment_id, p.amount, p.payment_date, p.payment_type, p.payment_status, c.course_name, u.user_real_name AS userRealName, co.coach_real_name AS coachRealName FROM gym_booking b JOIN gym_payments p ON b.user_id = p.user_id JOIN gym_courses c ON b.course_id = c.course_id JOIN gym_users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id JOIN gym_coachs co ON c.coach_id = co.coach_id ORDER BY b.booking_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gym_booking b JOIN gym_payments p ON b.user_id = p.user_id

SELECT b.booking_id, b.course_id, b.user_id, b.booking_date, p.payment_id, p.amount, p.payment_date, p.payment_type, p.payment_status, c.course_name, u.user_real_name AS userRealName, co.coach_real_name AS coachRealName FROM gym_booking b JOIN gym_payments p ON b.user_id = p.user_id JOIN gym_courses c ON b.course_id = c.course_id JOIN gym_users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id JOIN gym_coachs co ON c.coach_id = co.coach_id
WHERE c.course_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{courseName}, '%')
ORDER BY b.booking_date DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gym_booking b JOIN gym_payments p ON b.user_id = p.user_id JOIN gym_courses c ON b.course_id = c.course_id
WHERE c.course_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{courseName}, '%')

SELECT b.booking_id, b.course_id, b.user_id, b.booking_date, p.payment_id, p.amount, p.payment_date, p.payment_type, p.payment_status, c.course_name, m.member_fee, u.user_real_name AS userRealName, co.coach_real_name AS coachRealName FROM gym_booking b JOIN gym_courses c ON b.course_id = c.course_id JOIN gym_coachs co ON c.coach_id = co.coach_id JOIN gym_users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN gym_payments p ON b.booking_id = p.booking_id JOIN gym_member_cards m ON b.user_id = m.user_id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY b.booking_date DESC
